==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
The province's name derived from {{zh-l|餘杭}}, traditionally glossed as a mistake for {{zh-l|[[禹]][[航]]|[[w:Yu the Great|Yu]]'s [[ferry]]}} but more likely a transcription into Old Chinese characters of a native Proto-{{etyl|wuu|cmn}} placename.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=Hángzhōu
|c=hong4 zau1
|mn=Hâng-chiu
|cat=pn
}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{zh-div|市}} [[Hangzhou]], a [[former]] [[imperial]] [[capital]] and the [[present]] [[capital]] of [[Zhejiang]] [[province]] in [[China]].
# {{zh-div|灣}} [[Hangzhou]] [[bay|Bay]], the [[adjacent]] [[bay]] of the [[East China Sea]] [[separating]] [[Shanghai]] and [[Ningbo]].
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[Hang]] [[prefecture|Prefecture]] or [[province|Province]], a [[former]] [[division]] of [[imperial]] [[China]].
